00134 /*
00135 ** Macro Definitions
00136 */
00137 #define CFE_ES_DBIT(x) (1L << (x))                                    /* Places a one at bit positions 0 thru 31 */
00138 #define CFE_ES_DTEST(i,x) (((i) & CFE_ES_DBIT(x)) != 0)               /* TRUE iff bit x of i is set */
00139 #define CFE_ES_TEST_LONG_MASK(m,s)  (CFE_ES_DTEST(m[(s)/32],(s)%32))  /* Test a bit within an array of 32-bit integers. */
00140 #define CFE_ES_MAX_MEMPOOL_BLOCK_SIZES     17    
00142 /*
00143 **  Reset types
00144 */
00145 
00147 #define CFE_ES_PROCESSOR_RESET   1       
00148 #define CFE_ES_POWERON_RESET     2       
00150 #define CFE_ES_APP_RESTART       3       
00154 /*
00155 ** Reset Sub-Types
00156 */
00157 
00159 #define CFE_ES_POWER_CYCLE           1   
00160 #define CFE_ES_PUSH_BUTTON           2   
00161 #define CFE_ES_HW_SPECIAL_COMMAND    3   
00162 #define CFE_ES_HW_WATCHDOG           4   
00163 #define CFE_ES_RESET_COMMAND         5   
00164 #define CFE_ES_EXCEPTION             6   
00165 #define CFE_ES_UNDEFINED_RESET       7   
00166 #define CFE_ES_HWDEBUG_RESET         8   
00167 #define CFE_ES_BANKSWITCH_RESET      9   
00175 #define CFE_ES_CDS_MAX_FULL_NAME_LEN (CFE_ES_CDS_MAX_NAME_LENGTH + OS_MAX_API_NAME + 2)
00176 
00177 #define CFE_ES_CDS_BAD_HANDLE  (CFE_ES_CDSHandle_t) 0xFFFF
00178 
00180 /*
00181 ** ES Run Status and Exit Status defines
00182 */
00185 #define CFE_ES_APP_RUN                  1   
00186 #define CFE_ES_APP_EXIT                 2  
00187 #define CFE_ES_APP_ERROR                3  
00188 #define CFE_ES_SYS_EXCEPTION            4  
00189 #define CFE_ES_SYS_RESTART              5  
00190 #define CFE_ES_SYS_RELOAD               6  
00191 #define CFE_ES_SYS_DELETE               7  
00192 #define CFE_ES_CORE_APP_INIT_ERROR      8 
00193 #define CFE_ES_CORE_APP_RUNTIME_ERROR   9 
00196 #define CFE_ES_APP_KILL_TIMEOUT         5 
00198 #define CFE_ES_NO_MUTEX                 0 
00199 #define CFE_ES_USE_MUTEX                1 
00201 /*
00202 ** System Log Defines
00203 */
00204 /* "+1" is for the space between the timestamp and the message in the system log */
00205 #define CFE_ES_MAX_SYSLOG_MSG_SIZE (CFE_EVS_MAX_MESSAGE_LENGTH + CFE_TIME_PRINTED_STRING_SIZE + 1)

00218 /*

00220 */

00222 {

00228 } CFE_ES_DeviceDriver_t;

00230 
00231 /*
00232 ** 
00233 ** CFE_ES_AppInfo_t is a structure that is used to provide
00234 ** information about an app. It is primarily used for the QueryOne and
00235 ** QueryAll Commands.
00236 **
00237 */
00238 typedef struct
00239 {
00240    uint32   AppId;                          
00242    uint32   Type;                           
00245    uint8    Name[OS_MAX_API_NAME];          
00247    uint8    EntryPoint[OS_MAX_API_NAME];    
00249    uint8    FileName[OS_MAX_PATH_LEN];      
00252    uint32   StackSize;                      
00254    uint32   ModuleId;                       
00256    uint32   AddressesAreValid;              
00258    uint32   CodeAddress;                    
00260    uint32   CodeSize;                       
00262    uint32   DataAddress;                    
00264    uint32   DataSize;                       
00266    uint32   BSSAddress;                     
00268    uint32   BSSSize;                        
00270    uint32   StartAddress;                   
00272    uint16   ExceptionAction;                
00275    uint16   Priority;                       
00277    uint32   MainTaskId;                     
00279    uint32   ExecutionCounter;               
00281    uint8    MainTaskName[OS_MAX_API_NAME];  
00283    uint32   NumOfChildTasks;                
00287 } CFE_ES_AppInfo_t;
00288 
00289 /*
00290 ** Task Info Type
00291 */
00292 typedef struct
00293 {
00294    uint32   TaskId;                    
00295    uint32   ExecutionCounter;          
00296    uint8    TaskName[OS_MAX_API_NAME]; 
00297    uint32   AppId;                     
00298    uint8    AppName[OS_MAX_API_NAME];  
00300 } CFE_ES_TaskInfo_t;
00301 
00302 /*
00303 ** Memory Pool Statistics data type
00304 */
00305 typedef struct
00306 {
00307     uint32  BlockSize;               
00308     uint32  NumCreated;              
00309     uint32  NumFree;                 
00310 } CFE_ES_BlockStats_t;
00311 
00312 typedef struct
00313 {
00314     uint32                PoolSize;                
00316     uint32                NumBlocksRequested;      
00318     uint32                CheckErrCtr;             
00320     uint32                NumFreeBytes;            
00322     CFE_ES_BlockStats_t   BlockStats[CFE_ES_MAX_MEMPOOL_BLOCK_SIZES]; 
00324 } CFE_ES_MemPoolStats_t;
00325 
00326 typedef struct
00327 {

00330     boolean               Table;

00332     uint8                 ByteAlignSpare1; 
00333 } CFE_ES_CDSRegDumpRec_t;
